AdmissionSource.description: Specifies the source of the admission.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the clinical encounter of a patient with a care provider.

Category.description: Specifies the classification of the encounter.

DestinationFacilityId.description: The facility to which the patient is transferred.

DestinationOrganizationId.description: The organization to which the patient is transferred.

DietPreference.description: The diet preferences of the patient.

DischargeDispositionId.description: The status of the patient at discharge.

Duration.description: The duration of the patient encounter, in the given unit of measure.

DurationUnitId.description: The unit of measurement for the encounter duration.

EndDate.description: The date on which the encounter ended.

FacilityId.description: The facility where the encounter took place.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The system-generated name of the clinical encouter record.

PreAdmissionIdentifierId.description: The identifier for the encounter pre-admission.

PreviousFacilityId.description: The patient's location before the admission.

PreviousOrganizationId.description: The name of the organization where the patient was previously located.

PriorityId.description: The system-defined code that represents the priority associated with the urgency of the encounter.

ReadmissionCodeId.description: The system-defined code for the readmission.

RelatedClinicalEncounterId.description: Specifies an encounter that is related to this encounter.

ServiceAppointment.description: The appointment associated with this clinical encounter.

ServiceType.description: Specifies the classification of the type of service.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this record came from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this item was last changed in the source system.

SpecialCourtesy.description: Specifies a class of courtesy extended to the patient.

StartDate.description: The date on which the encounter began.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the patient encounter.

TypeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the type of the encounter.
